Author: vices666777
Text: the sitting on your chest feeling could actually be indigestion/acid reflux, which is really common after restricting for many years because your digestive system stops functioning well. at my worst I got it even with water. you could try an over-the-counter antacid or PPI and see if it helps,  if it doesn't I would really recommend seeing a doctor just to make sure nothing more serious is going on, please stay safe <3.

Author: shamsgirl
Text: Considering your smoking it might be an actual breathing problem but for me that sounds a lot like what happens when my anxiety is really bad, which usually coincides with when I’m restricting. Talk to your doctor tho I’m just an internet stranger
